title: Design notes: generate keys flow > profile name screen

milestone.title: 1.23.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
"This release should feature:

- Onboarding:
  Allow a user to restore their account using a seedphrase

- Syncing
  Allow a user to syncing/pair two unpaired devices

- Communities
  User facing token gating functionality

- General polish:
  further polish of messaging/communities/onboarding"

body:
## Problem 
Suggestions/issues on implementation in Figma are [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS/Feedback-for-Mobile?node-id=1908-165988&t=IygHPkoLwgiVR8Xa-4)


## Expected fixes

### Profile name
- [ ] Change paddings (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428217503))
- [ ] Check avatar size (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428005167))
- [ ]  Check initial text size (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428005420))
- [ ] Align photo icon to the avatar (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428006053))
- [ ]  Make edit box focused by default with opened keyboard (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428007727)) 
- [ ] "Name" shouldn't start with a capital letter (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428008049))
- [ ]  Check font size of placeholder(full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428217177))
- [ ]  Medium font size for "Accent colour"(full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428011481)) 
- [ ]  Change the background according to design (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428189441)) 

### Avatar drawer

- [ ]  Check icon design/size (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428200533)) 
- [ ]  Check drawer background (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428203070)) 

### Profile name - errors
- [ ]  "Special chars are not allowed" - Check size, design, distance to the text.... (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428266752)) 
- [ ]  Flickering screen on focus (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428273559)) 
Video (slowed down 1/4X)

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/235442939-54820d73-062d-459e-a9dd-5ef9b7b1036a.mp4

### Avatar selector
- [ ]   Flickering screen on selecting profile photos(full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1908:165988#428294187), video is [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JCZSsSNYy_2Q5UGoHOhQg6gJo_r_-K5K/view))
